description: Try our easy to follow Berry-ripple Popsicles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Berry-ripple Popsicles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir berries and sugar in a pan over medium heat until berries release juices. Stir combined lemon juice and cornflour into berry mixture and bring to the boil. Stir for 2 minutes until thick. Chill.

Meanwhile, beat cheese, milk and vanilla in a bowl until creamy. Gradually add thickened cream and beat until thick. Spoon into popsicle moulds, alternating with dollops of berry mixture. Freeze for 1-2 hours until firm but not frozen. Insert a popsicle stick into each mould. Cover and freeze for 6 hours.
